trans-unit.source: Represents a Windows progress bar control contained in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Windows 进度栏控件中包含<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ToolStripProgressBar is the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> optimized for hosting in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripProgressBar 是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>针对在一种<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>中承载优化</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: A subset of the hosted control's properties and events are exposed at the ToolStripProgressBar level, but the underlying <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control is fully accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.ProgressBar%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 托管的控件的属性和事件的一个子集公开 ToolStripProgressBar 级别，但基础<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>控件是完全可通过访问<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.ProgressBar%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.ProgressBar%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: A ToolStripProgressBar control visually indicates the progress of a lengthy operation.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripProgressBar 控件直观指示较长的操作的进度。

trans-unit.source: The ToolStripProgressBar control displays a bar that fills in from left to right with the system highlight color as an operation progresses.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripProgressBar 控件显示在填充从左到右，系统突出颜色显示操作进度栏。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The ToolStripProgressBar control can only be oriented horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> ToolStripProgressBar 控件只能是水平方向。

trans-unit.source: The ToolStripProgressBar control is typically used when an application performs tasks such as copying files or printing documents.
trans-unit.target: 通常，应用程序执行任务，例如复制文件或打印文档时，将使用 ToolStripProgressBar 控件。

trans-unit.source: Users of an application might consider an application unresponsive if there is no visual cue.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序的用户可以考虑应用程序停止响应，如果没有视觉提示。

trans-unit.source: Use the ToolStripProgressBar to notify the user that the application is performing a lengthy task and that the application is still responding.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripProgressBar 用于通知用户应用程序正在执行较长任务和应用程序是否仍然响应。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> properties define the range of values to represent the progress of a task.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A>属性定义值来表示任务的进度的范围。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property is typically set to a value of zero, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property is typically set to a value indicating the completion of a task.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A>属性通常设置为零，值与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A>属性通常设置为一个值，该值的任务完成。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, to display the progress properly when copying a group of files, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property could be set to the total number of files to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要复制的文件，一组时正确显示进度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A>属性无法设置为的文件总数，要复制。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property represents the progress that the application has made toward completing the operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>属性表示应用程序已完成该操作的进度。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Because the bar displayed in the control is a collection of blocks, the value displayed by the ToolStripProgressBar only approximates the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property's current value.
trans-unit.target: 由于在控件中显示的栏的块的集合，由 ToolStripProgressBar 显示的值只是约等于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>属性的当前值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Based on the size of the ToolStripProgressBar, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property determines when to display the next block.
trans-unit.target: 基于 ToolStripProgressBar，大小<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>属性确定何时将显示下一个块。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: There are a number of ways to modify the value displayed by the ToolStripProgressBar other than changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: 有多种方式可修改的值显示以外更改 ToolStripProgressBar<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>属性直接。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> property to specify a specific value to increment the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property by, and then call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method to increment the value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>属性来指定特定值要递增<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>属性，，然后调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>方法值增量。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>

trans-unit.source: To vary the increment value, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> method and specify a value by which to increment the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改增量值，可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A>方法并指定的增量值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A>

trans-unit.source: ToolStripProgressBar replaces the older <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control, which is nevertheless retained for backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripProgressBar 替换较旧<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>控件，将仍然保留为了向后兼容。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property is set to 0, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property is set to 100, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> property is set to 10.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A>属性设置为 0，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A>属性设置为 100，与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>属性设置为 10。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref> class with specified name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref>具有指定名称的类。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 名称<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: The background image displayed in the control.
trans-unit.target: 在控件中显示的背景图像。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant to this class.
trans-unit.target: 此属性与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"></xref> value.

trans-unit.source: Gets the spacing between the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref> and adjacent items.
trans-unit.target: 获取之间的间距<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref>与相邻项。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> value representing the spacing.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref>表示间距的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height and width of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref> in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 获取的高度和宽度<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref>以像素为单位。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Point.%23ctor%2A> value representing the height and width.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Drawing.Point.%23ctor%2A>表示的高度和宽度的值。

trans-unit.source: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: 按指定的数量增加进度栏的当前位置。

trans-unit.source: The Increment method enables you to increment the value of the progress bar by a specific amount.
trans-unit.target: Increment 方法，可通过特定量递增的值的进度栏。

trans-unit.source: This method of incrementing the progress bar is similar to using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> property with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的递增进度栏是类似于使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>具有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property specifies the current position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>属性指定的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>当前位置</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: If, after calling the Increment method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property is greater than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property remains at the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果是，调用 Increment 方法中之后,<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>属性大于的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>属性的值将保持<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: If, after calling the Increment method with a negative value specified in the `value` parameter, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property remains at the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果是，一个含有负值中指定调用 Increment 方法后的`value`参数，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>属性小于的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>属性的值将保持<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The amount by which to increment the progress bar's current position.
trans-unit.target: 若要增加进度栏依据的数量的当前位置。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value representing the delay between each <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle"></xref> display update, in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，表示每个之间的延迟<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle"></xref>显示更新，以毫秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: The MarqueeAnimationSpeed property gets or sets the delay of display update.
trans-unit.target: MarqueeAnimationSpeed 属性获取或设置显示更新的延迟。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, as you decrease the value of the MarqueeAnimationSpeed property, the speed of the animation increases.
trans-unit.target: 因此，在降低 MarqueeAnimationSpeed 属性的值，则动画的速度会增加。

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the delay, in milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示以毫秒为单位的延迟。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the upper bound of the range that is defined for this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置定义此范围的上限<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the upper limit of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定的上限<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the Maximum property is changed, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control.
trans-unit.target: 最大属性的值更改时，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>重绘控件以反映新控件的范围。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property is equal to the value of the Maximum property, the progress bar is completely filled.
trans-unit.target: 时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>属性等于最大属性的值，完全填充进度栏。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to specify a value that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property must be set to (by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property or using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> methods) to indicate that an operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性指定一个值，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>属性必须设置为 (通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>属性或使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>方法) 来指示操作已完成。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can set the value of the Maximum property to the total number of files in a file copy operation.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以设置最大属性的值为的文件复制操作中的文件总数。

trans-unit.source: Each time a file is copied, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property can be increased by one until the total number of files is copied.
trans-unit.target: 复制文件时，每次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>属性可以逐个增加，直到复制的文件总数。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: At that point, the progress bar would be completely filled.
trans-unit.target: 此时，将完全填充进度栏。

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the upper bound of the range.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示范围上限的整数。

trans-unit.source: The default is 100.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 100。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the lower bound of the range that is defined for this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此定义的范围下限<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies the lower limit of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定的下限<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the Minimum property is changed, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> control is redrawn to reflect the new range of the control.
trans-unit.target: 最小值属性的值更改时，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>重绘控件以反映新控件的范围。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property is equal to the value of the Minimum property, the progress bar is empty.
trans-unit.target: 时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>属性等于最小值属性的值、 进度栏为空。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: To change the value of the progress bar, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> property with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> method, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> method, or set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改进度栏的值，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>具有属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A>方法，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A>方法，或设置的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>属性直接。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the lower bound of the range.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示范围下限的整数。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.RightToLeftLayoutChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar.RightToLeftLayoutChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The OnRightToLeftLayoutChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnRightToLeftLayoutChanged 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Subscribes events from the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 托管控件订阅事件。

trans-unit.source: The control from which to subscribe events.
trans-unit.target: 向其订阅事件的控件。

trans-unit.source: Unsubscribes events from the hosted control.
trans-unit.target: 向托管控件取消订阅事件。

trans-unit.source: The control from which to unsubscribe events.
trans-unit.target: 向其取消订阅事件的控件。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: This event is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Advances the current position of the progress bar by the amount of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step*> property.
trans-unit.target: 进度栏的当前位置前移量<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step*>

trans-unit.source: The PerformStep method increments the value of the progress bar by the amount specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: PerformStep 方法将进度栏的值递增所指定的量<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> property to specify the amount that each completed task in an operation changes the value of the progress bar.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>属性来指定在操作中每个已完成的任务进度栏的值更改量</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are copying a group of files, you might want to set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> property to 1 and the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property to the total number of files to copy.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您要复制的一组文件，你可能想要设置的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>属性设置为 1 和的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A>属性设置为要复制的文件总数。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>

trans-unit.source: When each file is copied, you can call the PerformStep method to increment the progress bar by the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 复制每个文件后，你可以调用要递增的值的进度栏的 PerformStep 方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Step%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to have more flexible control of the value of the progress bar, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A> method or set the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property directly.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要更灵活地控制进度栏的值，则可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A>方法设置的值或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>属性直接。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Increment%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property specifies the current position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>属性指定的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>当前位置</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: If, after calling the PerformStep method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property is greater than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property remains at the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果是，调用 PerformStep 方法中之后,<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>属性大于的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>属性的值将保持<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: If, after calling the PerformStep method with a negative value specified in the `value` parameter, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property is less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> property remains at the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果是，一个含有负值中指定调用 PerformStep 方法后的`value`参数，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>属性小于的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>属性的值将保持<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: This is a strongly typed accessor for this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: 这是为此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>的强类型化访问器

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"></xref> object associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar"> </xref>与控件关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref> layout is right-to-left or left-to-right when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref>布局是从右到左或从左到右时<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref>属性设置为<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the RightToLeftLayout property to control the layout of international applications in which the language is written from right to left.
trans-unit.target: RightToLeftLayout 属性用于控制从右到左编写语言所采用的国际应用程序的布局。

trans-unit.source: When the RightToLeftLayout property is `true`, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>, mirroring will be enabled on the Windows form and control placement and text will be from right to left.
trans-unit.target: 当 RightToLeftLayout 属性是`true`，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>、 将在 Windows 窗体和控件放置上启用镜像和文本将从右到左。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to turn on mirroring and lay out control from right to left when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要启用镜像并从右到左在为控件布局<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"></xref>属性设置为<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft"> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.RightToLeftLayout*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 发生时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.RightToLeftLayout*>属性更改。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.RightToLeftLayout*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount by which to increment the current value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref> when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep*> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于递增的当前值的量<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref>时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep*>调用方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.PerformStep*>

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the incremental amount.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示增加量。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 10.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 10。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的样式<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarStyle"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置上显示的文本<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar> has a Text property, no text is shown on the control.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>具有文本属性，在控件上未显示任何文本。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing the display text.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>表示显示文本。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.target: 此事件与此类无关。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的当前值<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Value property must be in the range specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Value 属性中指定的范围必须是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProgressBar.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: An integer representing the current value.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示的当前值。
